attributes.action: protect and support Mr Peter Harvey, a kind and well-respected teacher who found himself in an untenable position during a key stage three science lesson (08/07/09).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent incident at the All Saints' R.C. School, Mansfield, I feel it is hugely important that attention is drawn to the stresses that pupil behaviour can bring to the teaching profession. Mr Peter Harvey was a victim of this stress, and this must be recognised as an indicator of the problems faced by teachers today. Prevention of a recurrence of such incidents is imperative.
